test
Class TestCase

java.lang.Object
  test.TestCase
public class TestCase
extends java.lang.Object

The description of a test case. TestCase is designed as an immutable class. The data of a test case is described in the XML document by a tag.

Version:
1.00 (Last update: March 4, 2008)
Author:
Dr. Wen-jun LI, Da LUO

          Input string of an expression of the test case.
private  boolean isExceptionExpected
          Whether the result is an thrown exception.
private  java.lang.String output
          Expected output of the test case.

Parameters:
anId - test case ID.
aDesc - description of the test case.
anInput - the input string of an expression.
anOutput - the expected output of test case.
isExc - the expected output is an exception.
